product_name: Nike Printed SW Rival Shorts - Women's
long_description: From the early-morning trail run to after-work gym classes, the Nike Printed SW Rival Shorts for women offer freedom of motion and high-performance fabric to keep you comfortable during activity. Dri-FIT(R) fabric delivers high-tech moisture wicking to keep you cool, dries quickly and feels soft against your skin. Built-in moisture-wicking, quick-drying liner shorts offer support and comfort. Flat seams and gusset reduce chafing and promote freedom of motion; wide, stretchy waistband features internal drawcord; reflective trademark swoosh increases your visibility. The Nike Printed SW Rival Shorts for women feature a zippered security pocket at the center back for small accessories.
short_description: From the early-morning trail run to after-work gym classes, the Nike Printed SW Rival Shorts for women offer freedom of motion and high-performance fabric to keep you comfortable during activity.
